name: Userstyles "Hitchhiker" DARK+CENTERED
description: A dark and centered version of our beloved userstyles.org! :) features: -dark interface -centered -userstyles Logo instead of plain text -optimized icons -hovering menu on style pages Also check out these dark themes :) Facebook "HitchHiker" Userstyles "HitchHiker" Youtube "HitchHiker" ZippyShare "HitchHiker" Greasy Fork "HitchHiker" Wikipedia Fork "HitchHiker" FEEL FREE TO SEND IDEAS, SUGGESTIONS AND QUESTIONS TO -> hitchhikerstyle@gmail.com Please comment and give feedback if you like this Style :) it would help me a lot in terms of motivation. Thanks!

user.name: Cruto
